name: Lunar Artifacts
description:
Lunar Artifacts

Princess Kaguya is currently on her way to being returned to the moon! In return, if you can collect all her impossible treasures and return them to her, can you help the princess stay on Earth?

ルナーアーティファクト

かぐや姫は月の都に帰ってみてる！お返しにアーティファクトを５個あげたら、彼女が地球で住んで続けるか？

My Site | My Twitter

(The Bamboo Cutter and the Moon Child)
